author: J.
F.
Morgan
D.
C.
Weisser
title: Inelastic scattering of α-partlcles from 12c below 18.0 MeV
abstract: We have studied the inelastic scattering of α-particles leading to the 7.65 MeV and the 9.65 MeV states of 12C from lab energy of 18.0 MeV down to 2 MeV above the threshold for each reaction. Angular distributions were obtained at energies where significant structure appeared in the excitation functions. The measured total cross sections were used to evaluate the effect of inelastic scattering processes on the rate of the 3α → 12C reaction in stellar interiors.
